snippet: European shares hit a seven-year high on Monday, rising for a third day as Italian banks rallied on the prospect of a corporate governance revamping, and Swiss stocks regained some of last week’s losses.
abstract: European stocks reach highest level since 2008.
lead_paragraph: European shares hit a seven-year high on Monday, rising for a third day as Italian banks rallied on the prospect of a corporate governance revamping, and Swiss stocks regained some of last week’s losses.

headline.main: European Stocks Reach Highest Point Since 2008
headline.print_headline: European Stocks Reach Highest Point Since 2008
